source.name: Exercise 4
source.instructions: Create a stored procedure named spGetItemMidPrice that retrieves rows/records from the item table whose price is greater than or equal to $7.00 and less than or equal to $10.00 sequenced in ASCending order of price. Output all table fields using the * operator. Hard-code those minimum and maximum price limits into the stored procedure.

sequence.output:
id	description	price	category	year	author	studio
38	Titanic	7.47	movie	1998	NULL	NULL
21	One Hundred Years of Solitude (Cien años de soledad)	7.89	book	1967	Gabriel García Márquez	NULL
40	Avatar	8.22	movie	2010	NULL	NULL

6	The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe	9.53	book	1950	C. S. Lewis	NULL

34	Finding Nemo	9.77	movie	2003	NULL	NULL
